caption: Table 1: Summary of used notations.
description: This table summarizes the notations used throughout the paper.  It lists mathematical symbols and their corresponding meanings, categorized for easier reference.  The notations cover various aspects of the paper, including set theory, stochastic processes, potential energy functions, probability distributions, Hilbert spaces, operators, covariance matrices, and neural network components.  This table is crucial for understanding the mathematical formalism presented in the paper.
